trans-unit.source: App install ads report
trans-unit.target: App install ads report

trans-unit.source: App install ads report
trans-unit.target: App install ads report

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to get to the **App install ads reports** page in Dev Center:
trans-unit.target: There are two ways to get to the **App install ads reports** page in Dev Center:

trans-unit.source: From the left navigation menu on your app's page, click **Analytics** > **App install ads**.
trans-unit.target: From the left navigation menu on your app's page, click **Analytics** > **App install ads**.

trans-unit.source: From the left navigation menu on your app's page, click **Monetization** > **Promote your app**, and then click a campaign's **Report** link.
trans-unit.target: From the left navigation menu on your app's page, click **Monetization** > **Promote your app**, and then click a campaign's **Report** link.

trans-unit.source: Here you'll see two sections: **Ad performance** and **Account billing history**.
trans-unit.target: Here you'll see two sections: **Ad performance** and **Account billing history**.

trans-unit.source: Ad performance
trans-unit.target: Ad performance

trans-unit.source: Here, performance metrics are displayed as lines plotted on a graph, with the selected metric on the y-axis and time on the x-axis.
trans-unit.target: Here, performance metrics are displayed as lines plotted on a graph, with the selected metric on the y-axis and time on the x-axis.

trans-unit.source: The default report shows Impressions.
trans-unit.target: The default report shows Impressions.

trans-unit.source: Click the tab headers to view data for other performance metrics.
trans-unit.target: Click the tab headers to view data for other performance metrics.

trans-unit.source: The metrics tracked here are:
trans-unit.target: The metrics tracked here are:

trans-unit.source: **Impressions**: The number of times your ad has been shown.
trans-unit.target: **Impressions**: The number of times your ad has been shown.

trans-unit.source: **Clicks**: The number of times someone clicked on your ad.
trans-unit.target: **Clicks**: The number of times someone clicked on your ad.

trans-unit.source: **Installs**: The number of times someone clicked on your ad and then installed your app.
trans-unit.target: **Installs**: The number of times someone clicked on your ad and then installed your app.

trans-unit.source: See below for more information on install tracking.
trans-unit.target: See below for more information on install tracking.

trans-unit.source: You can display performance data for up to four different ad campaigns at a time.
trans-unit.target: You can display performance data for up to four different ad campaigns at a time.

trans-unit.source: Click **More campaigns** to choose which campaigns to display.
trans-unit.target: Click **More campaigns** to choose which campaigns to display.

trans-unit.source: You can also click the minus symbol by a displayed campaign to remove it.
trans-unit.target: You can also click the minus symbol by a displayed campaign to remove it.

trans-unit.source: What is install tracking?
trans-unit.target: What is install tracking?

trans-unit.source: Running an install ad campaign through **Promote your app** on Dev Center provides much-needed exposure for developers trying to advertise their apps.
trans-unit.target: Running an install ad campaign through **Promote your app** on Dev Center provides much-needed exposure for developers trying to advertise their apps.

trans-unit.source: Ad impressions are shown to users who are most likely to be interested in the app, and the users click on the ad and install the app from the Store.
trans-unit.target: Ad impressions are shown to users who are most likely to be interested in the app, and the users click on the ad and install the app from the Store.

trans-unit.source: Until today, it was hard to distinguish between installs that were the result of an ad campaign versus installs that came from other sources.
trans-unit.target: Until today, it was hard to distinguish between installs that were the result of an ad campaign versus installs that came from other sources.

trans-unit.source: We have now enabled Install reports for app install campaigns that tell developers how many installs they have earned by running the ad campaign.
trans-unit.target: We have now enabled Install reports for app install campaigns that tell developers how many installs they have earned by running the ad campaign.

trans-unit.source: This only represents downloads that are a direct outcome of the ad campaign, and does not include downloads from other sources.
trans-unit.target: This only represents downloads that are a direct outcome of the ad campaign, and does not include downloads from other sources.

trans-unit.source: By monitoring installs for their ad campaigns, developers can measure the true return on investment from the money spent on promoting their apps.
trans-unit.target: By monitoring installs for their ad campaigns, developers can measure the true return on investment from the money spent on promoting their apps.

trans-unit.source: It also helps in comparing the cost of obtaining a new user with the lifetime value of users.
trans-unit.target: It also helps in comparing the cost of obtaining a new user with the lifetime value of users.

trans-unit.source: How are installs measured?
trans-unit.target: How are installs measured?

trans-unit.source: **Promote your app** ad campaigns deliver ad impressions within other apps.
trans-unit.target: **Promote your app** ad campaigns deliver ad impressions within other apps.

trans-unit.source: Users who are exposed to the ad are likely to install the app in one of two ways: by clicking the ad or based on viewing the ad impression.
trans-unit.target: Users who are exposed to the ad are likely to install the app in one of two ways: by clicking the ad or based on viewing the ad impression.

trans-unit.source: If a user is shown an ad and he or she installs the app within 24 hours -- by either clicking the ad, or directly going to the Store page of the app -- that install is attributed to the campaign that delivered the impression.
trans-unit.target: If a user is shown an ad and he or she installs the app within 24 hours -- by either clicking the ad, or directly going to the Store page of the app -- that install is attributed to the campaign that delivered the impression.

trans-unit.source: An install is tracked in the Store -- across phone, tablet, and PC -- based on the user who installed the app.
trans-unit.target: An install is tracked in the Store -- across phone, tablet, and PC -- based on the user who installed the app.

trans-unit.source: The advertising engine tracks users who see the ad and we use this information to correlate the users who viewed the ad with the users who installed the app.
trans-unit.target: The advertising engine tracks users who see the ad and we use this information to correlate the users who viewed the ad with the users who installed the app.

trans-unit.source: In order for the app install to be counted, a few requirements must be met:
trans-unit.target: In order for the app install to be counted, a few requirements must be met:

trans-unit.source: The user has not opted out of targeting.
trans-unit.target: The user has not opted out of targeting.

trans-unit.source: The user is logged in to a Microsoft account.
trans-unit.target: The user is logged in to a Microsoft account.

trans-unit.source: The user meets [COPPA](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkId=536558) requirements (users that don’t meet COPPA requirements cannot be tracked).
trans-unit.target: The user meets [COPPA](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink?LinkId=536558) requirements (users that don’t meet COPPA requirements cannot be tracked).

trans-unit.source: As a result, it is possible the app install tracking may *underreport* the actual number of installs generated by a **Promote your app** campaign.
trans-unit.target: As a result, it is possible the app install tracking may *underreport* the actual number of installs generated by a **Promote your app** campaign.

trans-unit.source: Please note that the total number of downloads for an app is viewable in the **Acquisitions** report in Dev Center.
trans-unit.target: Please note that the total number of downloads for an app is viewable in the **Acquisitions** report in Dev Center.

trans-unit.source: Account billing history
trans-unit.target: Account billing history

trans-unit.source: Here you can see all of the transactions associated with your account.
trans-unit.target: Here you can see all of the transactions associated with your account.

trans-unit.source: For each transaction, we show the **Transaction date**, the appropriate **Campaign name**, the **Payment instrument** charged, and the **Total amount** of the charge.
trans-unit.target: For each transaction, we show the **Transaction date**, the appropriate **Campaign name**, the **Payment instrument** charged, and the **Total amount** of the charge.

trans-unit.target: Related topics
